title: Toronto coach Nick Nurse
description:
Toronto Raptors coach Nick Nurse joins The Woj Pod on his new book, "Rapture," what most bothered him about life in the bubble, his pilgrimage to visit Phil Jackson, proving yourself to players as an NBA coach, and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
